47 void HoughDetection(const Mat& src_gray, const Mat& src_display, int cannyThreshold, int accumulatorThreshold, int numCamera)
48  {
49 
50  // will hold the results of the detection
51  vector<Vec3f> circles;
52  // runs the actual detection
53  HoughCircles( src_gray, circles, CV_HOUGH_GRADIENT, 1, src_gray.rows/8, cannyThreshold, accumulatorThreshold, 110, 195 );
54 
55 
56  // clone the colour, input image for displaying purposes
57  Mat display = src_display.clone();
58  for( size_t i = 0; i < circles.size(); i++ )
59  {
60  cout<<"camera "<<numCamera<<endl;
61  cout<<"radius"<<circles[i][2]<<endl;
62  Point center(cvRound(circles[i][0]), cvRound(circles[i][1]));
63  cout<<"center x"<<circles[i][0]<<" y "<<circles[i][1]<<endl;
64  int radius = cvRound(circles[i][2]);
65  // circle center
66  circle( display, center, 3, Scalar(0,255,0), -1, 8, 0 );
67  // circle outline
68  circle( display, center, radius, Scalar(0,0,255), 3, 8, 0 );
69  }
70 
71  // shows the results
72  if(numCamera==1)
73  imshow( "Hough Circle Transform", display);
74  else
75  imshow( "Hough Circle Transform 2", display);
76  }
77 
83 void ConnectCameras(Camera** &ppCameras)
84 {
85  //PointGrey
86 
87  Error error;
88 
89  BusManager busManager;
90  unsigned int numCameras=0;
91  while(numCameras!=2)
92  {
93  error = busManager.GetNumOfCameras(&numCameras);
94  if(error != PGRERROR_OK)
95  {
96  cout<<"Failed to get number of cameras"<<endl;
97  exit(1);
98  }
99  cout<<numCameras<<"cameras detected"<<endl;
100  }
101 
102  //Camera camera1, camera2;
103  ppCameras = new Camera*[numCameras];
104 
105  for(unsigned int i=0; i<numCameras;i++)
106  {
107  ppCameras[i] = new Camera();
108 
109  PGRGuid pGuid;
110  error = busManager.GetCameraFromIndex(i,&pGuid);
111  if(error != PGRERROR_OK)
112  {
113  cout<<"Failed to get index of camera 1"<<endl;
114  exit(1);
115  }
116 
117 
118  CameraInfo camInfo;
119 
120  //connect the two cameras
121  error=ppCameras[i]->Connect(&pGuid);
122  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
123  {
124  cout << "Failed to connect to camera"<<i <<endl;
125  exit(1);
126  }
127 
128  // Get the camera info and print it out
129  error = ppCameras[i]->GetCameraInfo( &camInfo );
130  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
131  {
132  cout << "Failed to get camera info from camera" << endl;
133  exit(1);
134  }
135  cout << camInfo.vendorName << " "
136  << camInfo.modelName << " "
137  << camInfo.serialNumber << endl;
138  }
139 
140  SetConfiguration(ppCameras[0]);
141  SetConfiguration(ppCameras[1]);
142 
143  for(int i =0;i<numCameras;i++)
144  {
145  error = ppCameras[i]->StartCapture();
146  if ( error == PGRERROR_ISOCH_BANDWIDTH_EXCEEDED )
147  {
148  cout << "Bandwidth exceeded" << endl;
149  exit(1);
150  }
151  else if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
152  {
153  cout << "Failed to start image capture" << endl;
154  exit(1);
155  }
156 
157  }
158 }
159 
165 void ImageCapture(Camera** ppCameras)
166 {
167  Mat imgGRAY;
168  Mat image1, image2;
169 
170  // create the main window, and attach the trackbars
171  namedWindow( "Camera 1", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
172  namedWindow( "Camera 2", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
173  namedWindow( "Disparity", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
174  //namedWindow( "Disparity sbm", CV_WINDOW_NORMAL );
175 
176  Property properties;
177  properties.type=FRAME_RATE;
178  ppCameras[0]->GetProperty(&properties);
179  cout<<"Frame rate "<<properties.absValue<<endl;
180 
181  // capture loop
182  int key = 0;
183  while(key != 1048689 && key != 1114193)
184  {
185  // Get the image camera 1
186  Image rawImage;
187  Error error = ppCameras[0]->RetrieveBuffer( &rawImage );
188  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
189  {
190  //cout << "capture error" << endl;
191  continue;
192  }
193 
194  // convert to rgb
195  Image rgbImage;
196  rawImage.Convert(PIXEL_FORMAT_BGR, &rgbImage );
197 
198  // convert to OpenCV Mat
199  unsigned int rowBytes = (double)rgbImage.GetReceivedDataSize()/(double)rgbImage.GetRows();
200  image1 = Mat(rgbImage.GetRows(), rgbImage.GetCols(), CV_8UC3, rgbImage.GetData(),rowBytes);
201 
202 
203  // Get the image camera 2
204  Image rawImage2;
205  error = ppCameras[1]->RetrieveBuffer( &rawImage2 );
206  if ( error != PGRERROR_OK )
207  {
208  //cout << "capture error" << endl;
209  continue;
210  }
211 
212  // convert to rgb
213  Image rgbImage2;
214  rawImage2.Convert(PIXEL_FORMAT_BGR, &rgbImage2 );
215 
216  // convert to OpenCV Mat
217  unsigned int rowBytes2 = (double)rgbImage2.GetReceivedDataSize()/(double)rgbImage2.GetRows();
218  image2 = Mat(rgbImage2.GetRows(), rgbImage2.GetCols(), CV_8UC3, rgbImage2.GetData(),rowBytes2);
219 
220  imshow("Camera 1", image1);
221  imshow("Camera 2", image2);
222 
223  Mat img1, img2;
224  img1=image1;
225  img2=image2;
226 
227 
228  cvtColor(img1, image1, CV_BGR2GRAY);//convert the image from BGR to Gray scale
229  cvtColor(img2, image2, CV_BGR2GRAY);//convert the image from BGR to Gray scale
230 
231  reconstrution3D(image1,image2);
232 
233  // get user key
234  key = waitKey(5);
235  ros::spinOnce();
236  }
237 
238  destroyWindow("Camera 1"); //destroy the window
239  destroyWindow("Camera 2");
240  destroyWindow("Disparity");
241 }
242 
249 void reconstrution3D(Mat image1, Mat image2)
250 {
251  Mat map1x, map1y, map2x, map2y;
252  Mat imgU1, imgU2;
253 
254  initUndistortRectifyMap(CameraMatrix1, disCoeffs1, R1, P1, image1.size(), CV_32FC1, map1x, map1y);
255  initUndistortRectifyMap(CameraMatrix2, disCoeffs2, R2, P2, image1.size(), CV_32FC1, map2x, map2y);
256 
257  remap(image1, imgU1, map1x, map1y, INTER_LINEAR, BORDER_CONSTANT, Scalar());
258  remap(image2, imgU2, map2x, map2y, INTER_LINEAR, BORDER_CONSTANT, Scalar());
259 
260  Mat disp, disp8;
261 
262  // Compute disparity
263  sgbm(imgU1, imgU2,disp);
264  normalize(disp, disp8, 0, 255, CV_MINMAX, CV_8U);
265  imshow("Disparity", disp8);
266 
267  // Compute world coordinates from the disparity image
268  Mat XYZ(disp8.size(),CV_32FC3);
269  reprojectImageTo3D(disp, XYZ, Q, false, CV_32F);
270  CreatePointCloud(XYZ);
271 
272  createTrackbar("P1", "Disparity", &sgbm.P1, 2000, NULL);
273  createTrackbar("P2", "Disparity", &sgbm.P2, 4000, NULL);
274  createTrackbar("preFilterCap", "Disparity", &sgbm.preFilterCap, 200, NULL);
275  createTrackbar("speckleWindowSize", "Disparity", &sgbm.speckleWindowSize, 200, NULL);
276 
277 }
278 
284 void CreatePointCloud(Mat XYZ)
285 {
286  sensor_msgs::PointCloud cloud;
287  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> SwissRanger_cloud;
288 
289  for(int i;i<XYZ.rows;i++)
290  {
291  for(int j=0;j<XYZ.cols;j++)
292  {
293  Point3f point = XYZ.at<Point3f>(i, j);
294  geometry_msgs::Point32 point3D;
295  if(point.z>0.2 && point.z<4)
296  {
297  point3D.x = point.x;
298  point3D.y = point.y;
299  point3D.z = point.z;
300  cloud.points.push_back(point3D);
301 
302  pcl::PointXYZ p;
303  p.x=cloud.points[i].x;
304  p.y=cloud.points[i].y;
305  p.z=cloud.points[i].z;
306  SwissRanger_cloud.push_back(p);
307  }
308  }
309  }
310  cout<<"size "<<cloud.points.size()<<endl;
311  if(cloud.points.size()>0)
312  {
313 
314  ballDetection(cloud);
315  }
316 }
317 
323 void ballDetection(sensor_msgs::PointCloud cloud)
324 {
325  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> camera_cloud;
326  for(int i;i<cloud.points.size();i++)
327  {
328  pcl::PointXYZ p;
329  p.x=cloud.points[i].x;
330  p.y=cloud.points[i].y;
331  p.z=cloud.points[i].z;
332  camera_cloud.push_back(p);
333  }
334 
335  pcl::PCLPointCloud2 cloud2;
336  pcl::toPCLPointCloud2 (camera_cloud, cloud2);
337  pcl::PCLPointCloud2::Ptr cloud3 (new pcl::PCLPointCloud2 (cloud2));
338  pcl::PCLPointCloud2::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PCLPointCloud2 ());
339  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PCLPointCloud2> sor;
340  sor.setInputCloud (cloud3);
341  sor.setLeafSize (0.01f, 0.01f, 0.01f);
342  sor.filter (*cloud_filtered);
343 
344  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 pp;
345 
346  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloudPtr (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>(camera_cloud));
347 
348  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
349  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
350  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
351  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
352  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_SPHERE); //detecting SPHERE
353  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
354  seg.setDistanceThreshold (0.02);
355  seg.setRadiusLimits(0.35, 0.55);
356  seg.setMaxIterations(1000000);
357  seg.setInputCloud (cloudPtr);
358  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
359 
360  if(inliers->indices.size ()>0)
361  {
362  cout << "Model coefficients: " << coefficients->values[0] << " "
363  << coefficients->values[1] << " "
364  << coefficients->values[2] << " "
365  << coefficients->values[3] << endl;
366 
367  pcl::PointXYZ center;
368  center.x = coefficients->values[0];
369  center.y = coefficients->values[1];
370  center.z = coefficients->values[2];
371 
372  geometry_msgs::PointStamped CentroidCam_1, CentroidCam_2;
373 
374  if(coefficients->values[3]<0.6)
375  {
376  CentroidCam_1.point.x = coefficients->values[0];
377  CentroidCam_1.point.y = coefficients->values[1];
378  CentroidCam_1.point.z = coefficients->values[2];
379  CentroidCam_1.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
380  ballCentroidCam1_pub.publish(CentroidCam_1);
381 
382  CentroidCam_2.point.x = coefficients->values[0]+T.at<double>(0,0)*pow(10,-1);
383  CentroidCam_2.point.y = coefficients->values[1];
384  CentroidCam_2.point.z = coefficients->values[2];
385  CentroidCam_2.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
386  ballCentroidCam2_pub.publish(CentroidCam_2);
387  }
388  else
389  {
390  CentroidCam_1.point.x = 0;
391  CentroidCam_1.point.y = 0;
392  CentroidCam_1.point.z = 0;
393  CentroidCam_1.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
394  ballCentroidCam1_pub.publish(CentroidCam_1);
395 
396  CentroidCam_2.point.x = 0;
397  CentroidCam_2.point.y = 0;
398  CentroidCam_2.point.z = 0;
399  CentroidCam_2.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
400  ballCentroidCam1_pub.publish(CentroidCam_2);
401  }
402 
403  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray targets_markers;
404  targets_markers.markers = createTargetMarkers(center);
405  markers_pub.publish(targets_markers);
406  }
407 
408 
409  pcl::toROSMsg(*cloudPtr,pp);
410  sensor_msgs::PointCloud stereoCloud;
411  sensor_msgs::convertPointCloud2ToPointCloud(pp, stereoCloud);
412 
413  stereoCloud.header.frame_id="/my_frame";
414  stereoCloud.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
415  stereoCloud_pub.publish(stereoCloud);
416 
417 }
418 
425 int main(int argc, char **argv)
426 {
427  ros::init(argc, argv, "Point_Grey");
428  ros::NodeHandle n;
429 
430  //read calibration paraneters
431  string a="/src/mystereocalib.yml";
432  string path = ros::package::getPath("calibration");
433  path=path+a;
434  FileStorage fs(path, FileStorage::READ);
435  if(!fs.isOpened())
436  {
437  cout<<"failed to open document"<<endl;
438  return -1;
439  }
440 
441  fs["CM1"] >> CameraMatrix1;
442  fs["CM2"] >> CameraMatrix2;
443  fs["D1"] >> disCoeffs1;
444  fs["D2"] >> disCoeffs2;
445  fs["R1"] >> R1;
446  fs["R2"] >> R2;
447  fs["P1"] >> P1;
448  fs["P2"] >> P2;
449  fs["Q"] >> Q;
450  fs["T"] >>T;
451 
452  sbm.state->SADWindowSize = 7;
453  sbm.state->numberOfDisparities = 112;
454  sbm.state->preFilterSize = 5;
455  sbm.state->preFilterCap = 61;
456  sbm.state->minDisparity = 0;
457  sbm.state->textureThreshold = 700;
458  sbm.state->uniquenessRatio = 0;
459  sbm.state->speckleWindowSize = 0;
460  sbm.state->speckleRange = 8;
461  sbm.state->disp12MaxDiff = 1;
462 
463  sgbm.SADWindowSize=5;
464  sgbm.numberOfDisparities=192;
465  sgbm.preFilterCap=4;
466  sgbm.minDisparity=-64;
467  sgbm.uniquenessRatio=1;
468  sgbm.speckleWindowSize = 150;
469  sgbm.speckleRange=2;
470  sgbm.disp12MaxDiff=10;
471  sgbm.fullDP=false;
472  sgbm.P1=950;
473  sgbm.P2=2500;
474 
475  ballCentroidCam1_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>( "/Camera1/ballCentroid", 10000);
476  ballCentroidCam2_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>( "/Camera2/ballCentroid", 10000);
477  stereoCloud_pub=n.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud>("stereoCloud", 10000);
478  markers_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>( "/markers4", 10000);
479 
480  Camera** ppCameras;
481  ConnectCameras(ppCameras);
482  ImageCapture(ppCameras);
483 
484  return 0;
485 }
